content: this is crochet doll pattern/ amigurumi pattern in pdf file not the actual toys **language ** english **materials and tools required ** 1 yarn any sport or dk light weight yarn i used yarnart jeans 4ply 55% cotton 45% acrylic 2 hook size 2 0mm 3 safety eyes 5mm 4 wire a short piece of wire about 10cm long 5 hot glue or glue that can be used for yarn 6 fiberfill 7 stitch markers 8 yarn needle 9 scissors 10 pins optional **basic crochet skills required ** the magic_ring chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet increase decrease **size ** if you use yarn as me the finished totoro will be 7 5cm / 3inch tall including the leaf should you have any questions regarding this crochet pattern or need assistance please feel free to contact us via the following channels - direct message - instagram demiwool if you are unable to find the files kindly contact demiwool via direct message providing your email address *this pattern is for personal use only please do not copy re-selling share translate or distribute all or part of this pattern you may sell finished products from this pattern provided using the hashtag #demiwool to credit us as designer *
